ComicInfo.Summary:
Dracula awakens in the modern world and continues his search for the Book of the Dead, while our hero Henry Harker journeys to the Amazon in search of the egg of the Gill-God.
Dracula did not die at the hands of his hunters: Jonathan Harker, Van Helsing, Mina Murray, and Quincey Morris, but was imprisoned along with other legendary monsters inside Jonathan Harker’s Forbidden Museum, located a mile under the British Museum. Now, they have been freed again to walk the Earth by Jonathan’s great, great-grandson Henry Harker, who must re-imprison them or stay the museum’s undead curator for eternity.
